data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Huesca push upfield but Valentin Pizarro Gomez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 2, Osasuna are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Huesca's half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal! Sandro Ramirez gives Huesca a 0-1 lead in Pamplona.
Throw-in Osasuna.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 8, Osasuna needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
In the minute 10, Osasuna's Oier breaks free at Estadio El Sadar. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 12, Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Free kick Osasuna.
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 15, Huesca drives forward and David Ferreiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Huesca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Pablo Insua (Huesca) has received a yellow card from Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Osasuna's Ruben Garcia goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 24, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Osasuna.
Inigo Perez for Osasuna drives towards goal at Estadio El Sadar. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Osasuna.
Ball safe as Osasuna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 30, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Huesca.
Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for Osasuna in Pamplona.
Huesca's Pedro Mosquera gets in a shot on goal at Estadio El Sadar. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 35, Osasuna have a goal kick.
Huesca's Rafa Mir is on target but unsuccessful.
Huesca are coming forward and Rafa Mir gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pamplona.
Sandro Ramirez of Huesca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
In the minute 38, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Osasuna close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Ante Budimir (Osasuna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 44, Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Free kick Osasuna.
Oier's header is off-target for Osasuna.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Corner awarded to Osasuna.
In the minute 46, Osasuna surge into the attack at Estadio El Sadar but David Garciaâ€™s header is off-target.
Huesca have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Roberto Torres with Enric Gallego.
Jagoba Arrasate (Osasuna) is making a second substitution, with Jon Moncayola replacing Juan Cruz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
Osasuna have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Ante Budimir gets his shot on target but fails to score for Osasuna.
In the minute 51, In Pamplona Osasuna drive forward through Ante Budimir. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Osasuna's Oier misses with an attempt on goal.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
Ruben Garcia (Osasuna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 56, Kelechi Nwakali is on a sub for Rafa Mir for Huesca.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jony for Osasuna drives towards goal at Estadio El Sadar. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 58, Huesca to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
In Pamplona Osasuna attack through Jony. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pamplona.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Osasuna.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Osasuna's Jon Moncayola gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, In Pamplona Osasuna attack through Facundo Roncaglia. The finish is off target, however.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Huesca drives forward and David Ferreiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Osasuna.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Throw-in for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Osasuna.
Goal! Osasuna draw level to 1-1 through a David Garcia header.
Jony instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 70, Huesca advance rapidly upfield but Valentin Pizarro Gomez blows for offside.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 72, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In Pamplona Osasuna drive forward through Jon Moncayola. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Osasuna.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In Pamplona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pedro Lopez (Huesca) has received a first yellow card.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Michel is making the team's second substitution at Estadio El Sadar with Shinji Okazaki replacing Sandro Ramirez.
Inigo Perez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Osasuna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 78, Osasuna are caught offside.
Throw-in Huesca.
Nacho Vidal is replacing Facundo Roncaglia for Osasuna at Estadio El Sadar.
The home team have replaced Ante Budimir with Adrian Lopez. This is the third substitution made today by Jagoba Arrasate.
In the minute 80, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Huesca.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 83, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Huesca's half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Osasuna make their fifth substitution with Enrique Barja replacing Jony.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Osasuna throw-in in Huesca's half.
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 86, Sergio Gomez is replacing David Ferreiro for the away team.
Juan Carlos is on a sub for Mikel Rico for Huesca.
Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Osasuna are in shooting range from this free kick.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a throw-in for Osasuna, close to Huesca's area.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Huesca.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio El Sadar.
Free kick Osasuna.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
At Estadio El Sadar, Kelechi Nwakali has been yellow-carded for the away team.
